Windows System Monitor (WinTop Ultimate)
Created By: Frank Gaxcs
==========================================

DESCRIPTION:
A powerful system monitoring tool similar to htop/top on Linux.
Monitor CPU, memory, disk I/O, network, and processes in real-time.

FEATURES:
- Real-time CPU monitoring (per-core)
- Memory and swap usage tracking
- Disk I/O statistics
- Network statistics
- Process management (view, sort, kill, start)
- Two display modes: TOP (simple) and HTOP (colorful)
- Pagination for viewing all processes
- Process sorting by CPU, Memory, PID, Name
- Kill processes by PID
- Start new processes

USAGE:
1. Run WinTop.exe
2. Select display mode (T for TOP, H for HTOP)

KEYBOARD COMMANDS:
C = Sort by CPU usage
M = Sort by Memory usage
N = Next page
P = Previous page
K = Kill a process
S = Start a new process
T = TOP mode
H = HTOP mode
+ / - = Adjust refresh speed
G = Sort by GPU
Q = Quit

REQUIREMENTS:
- Windows 7/8/10/11
- No additional software required

Version: 1.0 Ultimate Edition
Build Date: Wed 02/11/2026 10:51:45.09
